properties.name: Dogpatch Boulders
properties.description: Boulders only. The biggest bouldering gym on the West Coast. Big top-outs and crazy roofs.

properties.name: Mission Cliffs
properties.description: Nice big walls and routes that are changed frequently. Yoga classes, to stay Californian.

properties.name: Great Western Power Company
properties.description: Set up in an old power plant, this gym has a very friendly staff and vibe.

properties.name: Hollywood Boulders
properties.description: This place is brand new, and is home to the hippest crowd of LA.

properties.name: LA Boulders
properties.description: This industrial neighborhood was a natural place to build a climbing gym, and hipster coffee places.

properties.name: Westway Centre
properties.description: Offers climbing amongst other sports, in a pretty central location of London.

properties.name: Der Kegel
properties.description: In the mythical 99 Revaler Strasse stands the friendliest bouldering gym of Berlin, with indoor and outdoor walls.

properties.name: Antrebloc
properties.description: If nothing has changed, this location does not have the cleanest holds, but they do have beer and a patio.

properties.name: Blocbuster Courbevoie
properties.description: Friendly staff and a strong challenge in the tunnel, a 15-meters-long bouldering overhang.

properties.name: Blocbuster Cnit
properties.description: The younger brother of the Blocbuster family has very nice routesetting and is the place where young business people in suits come workout with coworkers.

properties.name: MurMur Issy-Les-Moulineaux
properties.description: A series of arches turned into long routes and hidden overhang gems.

properties.name: MurMur Pantin
properties.description: The mythical gym has recently opened a brand new bouldering section, which makes it even more attractive. Check out the ch√¢let inside!

properties.name: Le Nautil
properties.description: Copyrock walls and very high routes for every level, with a small but challenging bouldering section.

properties.name: BlockOut
properties.description: The most crowded bouldering gym of the Paris Region, were routesetters tend to have a taste for epic moves.

properties.name: IronWorks
properties.description: A nice mix between boulders and ropes, with a big weight room.

properties.name: Bridges
properties.description: The holds are old, the air is full of chalk, but who cares! The crowd is full of happy Berkeley students and passionate climbers.
